short_description: les vins bruchez is a wine shop/winery based in flanthey, switzerland.
long_description: vins bruchez unterstützt cheryl sunier, vielversprechende junge skifahrerin und grosse hoffnung auf schweizer ski. die mitglieder des vereins "wyschiff", zu dem auch vins bruchez gehört, heissen sie herzlich willkommen zu einer entdeckungsreise in die welt der schweizer weine. die vins bruchez sa bewirtschaften an den sonnigsten rebhängen des rechten rhone-ufers, zwischen siders und sion, ein 8 ha umfassendes weingut. unsere weine werden, unter wahrung der familientradition, mit modernster technik, hoher fachkompetenz und grosser leidenschaft ausgebaut. les vins bruchez sa à flanthey est une cave familiale de la quatrième génération de vignerons-encaveurs. depuis 1912 au service de la qualité.
generated_description: vins bruchez, legally known as vins bruchez sa., is a family-owned winery located in lens, wallis, switzerland. established in 1912, the winery is managed by the fourth generation of winemakers and vintners. situated on the sunny slopes of the right bank of the rhone river, between siders and sion, the 8-hectare estate produces 18 grape varieties, including chardonnay, pinot noir, and gamay. the winery's vineyards benefit from chalk and limestone soils and a microclimate that is among the driest in switzerland, resulting in optimal ripening conditions. vins bruchez sa is committed to maintaining environmental sustainability and uses modern technology and high-quality expertise to produce wines that highlight the unique characteristics of each grape variety. the winery also offers wine tastings and events, including a cozy setting for gatherings with up to 25 people.
